Titusville offers conveniently located groceries and supermarket stores, shopping plazas with major and specialty retailers, shops in our Historic Downtown District and a generous assortment of unique shops sprinkled throughout our city. Address & Directions General Inquiries Address & Directions Physical Address Asheville Chamber and Visitor Center 36 Montford Avenue Asheville, NC 28801 Hours of Operation Asheville Chamber offices: Monday-Friday: 8:30 a.m.-5 p.m. The Visitor Center is open seven days a week. Monday-Friday:  8:30 a.m.-5 p.m. Saturday-Sunday:  9 a.m.-5 p.m. Directions From I-240 Eastbound, exit at 4C Haywood/Montford. Turn right at light onto Haywood Street. At next stop light, turn right on to Montford Ave. The Chamber building is located on the left. From I-240 Westbound, exit at 4C Haywood/Montford. Turn right at light onto Montford Ave. The Chamber building is located on the left. Mailing Address Asheville Area Chamber of Commerce P.O. Box 1010 Asheville, NC 28802 General Inquiries For general information about the Asheville Area Chamber of Commerce, contact us at: Phone: 828.258.6129 Fax: 828.251.0926 member@ashevillechamber.org Please note: We are transitioning our phone system and will not have voicemail available until mid to late June. If you can’t reach particular staff via phone, we encourage you to email or call the Visitor Center desk at 828-258-6129. Representing a diverse cross-section of industries, our Board works collaboratively to promote economic growth, advocate for pro-business policies, and ensure our members and community continue to thrive. Click here > About Events News Resources Sponsorship Partners Ribbon Cuttings Chambers Plan HR Covered Directory Contact Log out Become a Member > Become A Member Have a question or just want to say Hello? Feel free to reach out to us! You can contact us by phone, email or the contact form. We are available and happy to help you! Our business hours are 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday to Thursday; Closed on Friday's. We're here to help! Simply fill in the form below, and we'll respond within 1-2 business days! Inquiring about... Membership Events Grants & Financial Support Advertising Sponsorships Other Thank you! Your submission has been received! Something went wrong. Please try again. Here's where you can reach us 16 Second Street West, Cornwall, ON K6J 1G2 (613) 933-4004 info@cornwallchamber.com FREQUENTLY Asked Questions How much does a membership cost? The price ranges depending on your business type and the number of employees you have. For a full breakdown, visit our Become a Member page for more details! How can I join? Visit our Become a Member page and sign up at the bottom of the page. We'd love to have you join! How do I pay an invoice? Payment can be made via EFT, cheque, or e-transfer to bero@cornwallchamber.com. Click here for more information. How is the Chamber funded? We are a Non-Profit Organization run by Volunteer Board Members, with our funding coming from Events, Membership Fees, and Sponsorship Revenue. We are not government funded. Why should I become a member? The Cornwall and Area Chamber of Commerce is the voice for our local businesses. We advocate for our members, provide new opportunities, and connect you with the community! Learn more about how we support you here > What are the member benefits? Members can access exclusive offers like discounted insurance policies and shipping, group medical plans, grant opportunities, and more. We also give your business opportunities to grow with our member directory, newsletters, sponsorships, and more! Learn about all the details here > How do I register for the benefits? Some benefits require a code you'll receive once you sign up, and others will automatically apply for being a Chamber member. What is Pub Night? When is the next one? Pub Nights are a monthly networking event hosted by the Cornwall and Area Chamber of Commerce. Each Pub Night is held at a different business (i.e. Schnitzels, Boston Pizza, etc.) Check out our Events page to see when the next Pub Night takes place! Where can I find Government Grants? Government Grants will be posted here on our website and sent to your inbox through our Chamber Newsletters as they become available. Join the Cornwall & Area Chamber of commerce Benefit from all the resources available to help your business thrive, join us at networking events, and more. Visit Safely - Titusville FL Chamber of Commerce (321) 348-4748 (321) 348-4748 Your Chamber Member Benefits / Join Board of Directors Staff Members Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Affinity Partners / Discounts Celebrating 100 Years Visiting Here Adventure Videos Adventure Photos Adventure Maps Ideas & Itineraries Our Welcome Center Explore Our Trails About Launch From Here Share Your Adventure Stay Play Shop Dine Space Nature Our Community Excels A Florida Trail Town RIDE IT DOWN 2025 Brevard’s Scorecard Visit Our Store Show Some Local Love Our Directory Events Chamber Events Community Events Submit an Event News Stories and Adventures Chamber Updates Regional News Contact Us = --Select a page-- Your Chamber Visiting Here Our Community Our Directory Events News Contact Us To Titusville Area CHAMBER website | To CITY of Titusville website | To ZONE website Reboot/Home Reopening Our Workforce Local Love Take The Pledge Pledge Takers Visit Safely Things YOU CAN DO to Visit Safely Although travel restrictions around the Coronavirus pandemic have loosened, most of our businesses are still operating under some sort of restrictions. Enhanced safety measures are in place across the Space Coast and include increased sanitatization processes, physical distancing, and capacity limitations. All of this is in an effort to protect our citizens and our welcomed visitors. We encourage you to call ahead for specific information about your desired destination – many places have modified hours, limited access and availability – so plan before you arrive. You can contact the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce at 321-267-3036 or info@titusville.org if you would like assistance in planning your itinerary. Click for PDF We also ask you to embrace the  ideas in our Responsible Travel Pledge – and help us protect our assets for f uture visitors – and the people who are lucky enough to live here. Roam Responsibly. I will explore thoughtfully and responsibly, maintaining the utmost respect for everyone and everything I encounter. Educate Myself. I will do my research before traveling, familiarizing myself with local regulations and community concerns, which may have changed over time. Safety First. I will follow public health directives from government officials, including social distancing measures. I will take all necessary steps to minimize health risks to myself and others and stay home if I’m sick. Preserve Florida. I will protect and nurture our pristine outdoor spaces and cultural places, by maintaining a light footprint at every turn and paying special attention to delicate ecosystems. Embrace Community. I will support local businesses and do my part to ensure the long-term prosperity of the places I visit. Celebrate Culture. I will immerse myself in the diverse local cultures and embrace the traditions and practices I encounter. Teach Others. I will lead by example and share these practices with fellow travelers, acknowledging that we all share the responsibility to protect Florida, California, and every one of our glorious states, parks and our people. Thank you, and be safe. We want to thank the Visit California pros for the inspiration for this initiative.  Their commitment to responsible travel is a model, and we have patterned our Responsible Travel Pledge after theirs. Your Chamber - Titusville FL Chamber of Commerce (321) 348-4748 (321) 348-4748 Your Chamber Member Benefits / Join Board of Directors Staff Members Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Affinity Partners / Discounts Celebrating 100 Years Visiting Here Adventure Videos Adventure Photos Adventure Maps Ideas & Itineraries Our Welcome Center Explore Our Trails About Launch From Here Share Your Adventure Stay Play Shop Dine Space Nature Our Community Excels A Florida Trail Town RIDE IT DOWN 2025 Brevard’s Scorecard Visit Our Store Show Some Local Love Our Directory Events Chamber Events Community Events Submit an Event News Stories and Adventures Chamber Updates Regional News Contact Us = --Select a page-- Your Chamber Visiting Here Our Community Our Directory Events News Contact Us --Select a Subpage-- Member Benefits / Join Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Get Involved: Events Our Directory Join Chamber Events Chamber Updates Board of Directors Staff Members LAUNCH YOUR BUSINESS Your Chamber The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce was founded by volunteers in 1922 and is the oldest chamber in Brevard County. It is a non-profit organization that is funded primarily through membership dues paid by local businesses in Titusville, Florida, as well as various fundraising projects. Benefits of membership include referrals, promotional opportunities, enrollment in business educational seminars, access to networking events, involvement in advocacy initiatives, and several other business-related opportunities.  Our resources can help new, existing, and expanding businesses develop strategies to tackle tough challenges, increase productivity and understand the ever-changing issues that impact business and our community. Citizens and visitors alike look to the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce for reliable information and references about the best our community has to offer.  Our organization and members share the desire to improve the community and the climate for business.  We help direct the energies of those who believe that a community worth living in is a community worth fighting for. Mission Statement: To develop, enhance, and maintain a strong and diverse business climate and support a prosperous community. The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce is governed by a volunteer board of directors, and has a professional staff of five. Get a headstart on the fun right here: There are such riches in Titusville it’s a challenge to tell everything you need to know to fully explore and have the great adventures we wish for you. But this video is a great place to start. HEADING TO THE BEACH? Playalinda Beach Stops. Stops 1-10 are open. Stops 2, 3, 8 & 10 are wheelchair accessible. Playalinda Beach is often named as one of the most natural and beautiful beaches on the East Coast, miles of shoreline for walking, fishing, and enjoying the lapping waves. This is part of Canaveral National Seashore and there is a small fee to enter. Some areas may be closed for repair. Always check before you go. For the latest updates, go to nps.gov/cana or call 386-428-3384. Three Days of AMAZEMENT Invent your own fun using the tips we provide here. Explore our space history and future at Kennedy Center Visitors Complex. Get outside and experience the incredible beauty–in every direction. Discover outdoor recreation opportunities that surround you. Just 24 hours? Go here. Download 3-Day Itinerary here. Need a QUICK PEEK around? See Video Views here. natural  landscapes waterside fun and dining incredible wildlife hidden gems photographers love (Warning: These videos will make you fall in love with our town.) Here for a ROCKET LAUNCH? Get our EPIC LAUNCH VIEWING Map . Or…Pick one up at the WELCOME CENTER. To track launches, and stay informed, go to: visitspacecoast.com/launches ACCOMMODATIONS? Oh, My! Explore more. You will discover so many options, including: 1500+ Hotel & Motel Rooms locally 950 RV Sites & Camp Sites Discover great adventures—from viewing an epic rocket launch to watching dolphins play, hiking, cycling, kayaking under the stars, dining on fresh-caught seafood  and exploring the beauty that surrounds you on all sides. Explore Our TRAILS Did you know that three major cycling trails converge here ? Coast to Coast Trail St Johns River-to-Sea Loop East Coast Greenway And Titusville is an official Florida Trail Town. Learn more about trail towns here. You’ll be Surprised Visit these special places. Warbird Air Museum –memorabilia, both military and civilian, WWII air craft, awesome events American Space Museum (and Space Walk of Fame) –knowlegeable docents, amazing collection Harry T. & Harriett V. Moore Cultural Center (and replica Moore homestead) — early civil rights activists killed when their home was bombed on Christmas Eve 1951 White Sands Buddhist Center (largest white granite statutes in Florida, magnificent!) American Police Hall of Fame (and indoor shooting range) Explore Historic Titusville So much history.  Much of it can be reached by simply walking. Wander through Historic Titusville, with the Historic Titusville interactive guide from the City of Titusville and the Titusville Historic Preservation Board.  Extensive and fascinating historical information in easy to use options. The mobile app can be accessed on Apple App Store and Google Play: search for Explore Historic Titusville FL. More Stories & Adventures Capturing authentic opportunities for you. Get more deeply in touch with where to explore by reading all the Stories & Adventures. To get every Story & Adventure published emailed to  you, use this button to sign up: Great adventures #LaunchFromHere Launch From Here describes a place known around the world for space exploration and rich in nature-based recreation –perfect for outdoor adventures nearly every day of the year. Launch From Here is a proud phrase, representing our exploration legacy and holds promise for a future rich in possibility for those who join us here. Launch From Here represents all the things we launch –from rocket ships to cycle races, to business ventures and careers, to families and their dreams. The Launch From Here campaign is a community based effort– by the Titusville Area Chamber Visitors Council with support from the Space Coast Office of Tourism and the City of Titusville—created by people who love to live here for the people who will love to visit here, live here, grow here, stay here. Still have questions? We can help.  Contact the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce at 321-267-3036. Or visit the TITUSVILLE WELCOME CENTER. Copyright © 2025 Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce. Our Community Excels - Titusville FL Chamber of Commerce (321) 348-4748 (321) 348-4748 Your Chamber Member Benefits / Join Board of Directors Staff Members Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Affinity Partners / Discounts Celebrating 100 Years Visiting Here Adventure Videos Adventure Photos Adventure Maps Ideas & Itineraries Our Welcome Center Explore Our Trails About Launch From Here Share Your Adventure Stay Play Shop Dine Space Nature Our Community Excels A Florida Trail Town RIDE IT DOWN 2025 Brevard’s Scorecard Visit Our Store Show Some Local Love Our Directory Events Chamber Events Community Events Submit an Event News Stories and Adventures Chamber Updates Regional News Contact Us = --Select a page-- Your Chamber Visiting Here Our Community Our Directory Events News Contact Us Our Community Excels It’s time to take a close look at Titusville and North Brevard. Significant concentrated advanced manufacturing growth and continued business evolution and innovation in space and aerospace are driving positive outlooks long term for this area, with local, regional and global impacts. LAUNCH FROM HERE or expand to launch something bigger from here. Our partners in economic development are listed on this page . Take advantage of their expertise. Be part of the 21st Century Titusville climb to new heights. North Brevard is at the leading edge of Brevard County’s technology foundation , and it’s steeped in history.  READ ON…learn about our rich history, our 50+ years of space innovation, our abundant nature, and who lives here–our people. Great adventures- -and wonderful life stories–launch from here. ASK THE EXPERTS ABOUT: Site Selection Assistance— current market availability and comparative analysis of real estate Financial Assistance— information on state and local incentives, grants and other support applicable to benefit new projects Customized Data Services — proprietary market research including labor market, utility, transportation and tax costs Talent Pipeline — assistance in connecting you to talent recruitment experts Employee Training —technical training programs and custom training for relocating employees from our educational institutions and in partnership with government entities If you are interested in more information about our economy or if we can connect you to some of our regional economic development partners, we are happy to help.  Contact Erin Akins ( akins@titusville.org ) so we can learn a little more about your goals and help you make the most beneficial connections. PARTNERING FOR OUR FUTURE EDC of FLORIDA’s SPACE COAST The Economic Development Commission of Florida’s Space Coast is a nationally-respected county-wide EDO partnering with the Brevard County Commission and the Space Coast business community. This EDC has been successful in attracting new business investment and expanding existing industry on the Space Coast, supporting efforts of Space Coast military installations, and assisting manufacturing and high tech companies. Contact Trudy McCarthy, MEDP, Executive Vice President TMcCarthy@SpaceCoastEDC.org.  or Tell Us About Your Project THE NORTH BREVARD ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ZONE The Zone (North Brevard Economic Development Zone) is a independent district under Florida law that seeks to provide financial and technical assistance to qualified firms considering a relocation or expansion in the northern part of Brevard County, Florida. Learn about the leadership of The Zone or contact Troy Post, CEcD, Executive Director, at 321-264-6750, or at troy.post@brevardcounty.us . CITY OF TITUSVILLE The City of Titusville, under the leadership of City Manager, Scott Larese, has a significant strategic plan (https://www.titusville.com/329/Strategic-Plan) and more recent market studies of value and can provide assistance with incentives, site selection, the permitting process and coordination with partnering agencies. Contact Nicolas Gow, Economic Development Director: 321-567-3774 Email Nicholas Gow Go here for the latest edition of Talking Points. BREVARD COUNTY Brevard County is composed of 5 districts. North Brevard is in District 1. District 1 contains the towns of Cocoa, Scottsmoor, Mims, Titusville, Port St. John, Canaveral Groves and Sharpes and its footprint includes notably Kennedy Space Center, the Merritt Island National Wildlife Refuge and the Indian River Lagoon.   Contact District 1 Commissioner, Rita Pritchett at (321) 607-6901. District 1 offices are located at: 7101 South U.S.1. TOMORROW LAUNCES HERE Help Us Write the Story of Tomorrow on Florida’s Space Coast. Florida’s most innovative community is also its most inviting. This unified brand was developed by the community though extensive research and community conversations– and is for the community—highlighting  the unique opportunities found here.  Be part of something out of this world.  Learn more at https://flspacecoast.org SPACE FLORIDA Space Florida is an independent special district of the state. Similar to an airport or seaport authority, it’s capable of earning profit, borrowing money and partnering with commercial business, as well as federal, state and local governments. This makes Space Florida very flexible when it comes to acting as an industry partner or an agent of economic development.   Contact Matt Chesnut, Director of Business & Economic Development:  321-730-5301 Ext: 256 mchesnut@spaceflorida.gov CAREERSOURCE BREVARD CareerSource Brevard is part of a statewide network of 24 regions, known as CareerSource Florida, administers The Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA), grants and employment/employer support activities, including job recruitment, retention and training, and a Board of Directors with more than 40% representing private industry. CLICK here for details on the City of Titusville "reboot" website. The Titusville Welcome Center The Titusville Welcome Center is located at 419 South Hopkins Avenue in Titusville. Inside the Welcome Center, they provide information about the Titusville Area and events to visitors and bicycle trail users. In the other part of the building, Coast to Coast Bicycle Company will provide rentals, repairs, sales of bicycles and equipment, while also providing group rides and trail events to the community. CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFORMATION About the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce was founded by volunteers in 1924. The Chamber is a non-profit organization that is funded through membership dues paid by local businesses and various fundraising projects. The primary focus of the Chamber is directed towards helping its members. Our mission is to develop, enhance and maintain a strong and diverse business climate and support a prosperous community. advertising opportunities Relocation Packet Reach potential new residents with our Relocation Packet. This packet of valuable information is mailed to people outside the Titusville area who have shown an interest in relocating to the area. The relocation packet is provided FREE upon request and includes IMAGES of Titusville (the chamber's directory of members), a city map and promotional marketing material from area businesses. Last year approximately 1,000 relocation packets were mailed to potential new residents. Some of the requested information includes: Homes Apartments Jobs Schools Entertainment Insurance Moving Companies Storage Facilities Medical Care Banks Investment (2006): $120.00 per year (year contract can start at anytime) Contact: Carol Wilson at Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce at 321-267-3036 Requirements: 100 copies (per month) of the marketing piece you wish to include. Flyer must not exceed 8.5" x 11". Call for specific details. ADVERTISE IN CHAMBER NEWSLETTER Would you like to advertise your company in the Titusville Chamber's Newsletter free of charge? Run a 40–50 word news brief in the Business Briefs section free of charge. Or perhaps you'd like to run a full color ad? We are now offering color ads to chamber members for a fee, either monthly or you can purchase a six month commitment. Please contact the Chamber for more information on pricing and ad sizes. GIVE US YOUR GOOD NEWS The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce wants to help promote your business and its achievements. As a free service to its members, the Chamber will include 40–50–word news brief about your business in our ConTACt Newsletter. New employees, grand openings, business anniversaries, new product lines, new services, achievements, and awards are all suitable material to appear in our business briefs section in the newsletter. ConTACt reaches over 1,000 business owners and the general public. This service is only open to Chamber Members. Deadline for submission is the 10th of the month to be included in next month's newsletter. For example, if you submit a brief to us on December 10, the information will then appear in the January newsletter. All submissions are subject to editing and space availability. Please provide us with a press release or simply hand–write your information ON THIS FORM . For questions please call 267-3036 or email at newsletter@titusville.org August 16, 2005 Click for enlargement. Contact: Tracey Giemza 321–267–3036 – Giemza@titusville.org Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce seeks Volunteers Titusville, Fla – The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce is a non–profit organization that promotes and engages in activities that improve individual business, develop a stronger local economy and create a prosperous community. The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce was founded by volunteers in 1924, and is in need of volunteers to help assist the chamber staff of 6. Volunteers at the Titusville Chamber of Commerce help staff the busy office in involved in many community activities, helping local businesses, residents and tourists. The needed volunteers will do a variety of tasks, such as: answering phones, helping walk–in clients, and filing. There is no time minimum or maximum. If you enjoy working with the public and meeting new people, the Titusville Chamber is right for you. One need not have experience, as the Chamber will train. The Chamber is a non–profit organization that is funded through membership dues paid by local businesses, and various fundraising projects.

Member Benefits / Join - Titusville FL Chamber of Commerce (321) 348-4748 (321) 348-4748 Your Chamber Member Benefits / Join Board of Directors Staff Members Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Affinity Partners / Discounts Celebrating 100 Years Visiting Here Adventure Videos Adventure Photos Adventure Maps Ideas & Itineraries Our Welcome Center Explore Our Trails About Launch From Here Share Your Adventure Stay Play Shop Dine Space Nature Our Community Excels A Florida Trail Town RIDE IT DOWN 2025 Brevard’s Scorecard Visit Our Store Show Some Local Love Our Directory Events Chamber Events Community Events Submit an Event News Stories and Adventures Chamber Updates Regional News Contact Us = --Select a page-- Your Chamber Visiting Here Our Community Our Directory Events News Contact Us --Select a Subpage-- Member Benefits / Join Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce Committees Get Involved: Events Our Directory Join Chamber Events Chamber Updates Board of Directors Staff Members LAUNCH YOUR BUSINESS Member Benefits / Join Join the Chamber and GROW your business The Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce is a central connector in the North Brevard community, and a vast resource of benefits for local business .  Membership gives you access to educational opportunities, networking , marketing and promotion , discounts and more ! 1. A Strong Economy A positive business environment doesn’t just happen.  It is the result of business and community leaders coming together to improve this place we call home. 2. Business Advocacy Your business is affected by decisions made at the local, state and federal levels.  The Chamber helps ensure elected officials consider issues important to business. 3. Get Connected The greatest power of a Chamber is in helping businesses make connections – whether it be with other businesses or potential customers. MEMBERSHIP LEVELS The Titusville Chamber offers a tiered-dues approach to member investment, based on the level of involvement you want to have in YOUR chamber. BASE MEMBERSHIP Base membership in the chamber offers a wide range of benefits, including: New Member Coupons, valued at over $1000 Networking Opportunities at over 70 events a year The opportunity to make a difference at over 40 committee meetings a year Display space for business cards or brochures in our lobby Profile listing on the Chamber’s website directory, including the ability to map and get directions Secure online e-mail system (protecting your info while still allowing customers to reach you) Link to your web page and social media pages Opportunity to submit coupons for member to member and consumer discounts Ribbon Cuttings and Grand Opening support 50-word business brief monthly in our monthly newsletter Subscription to monthly newsletter about community information and events Referrals-phone, website and Chamber/Welcome Center walk-ins Use of Chamber logo in advertising & promotion Press Release Distribution Access to Broadcast E-mail Service Base rates vary depending on the type of membership. $350 – Business $265 – Home Based Business $150-$350 – Non-Profit Organization (varies based on number of full-time employees) $150- Individual We also have discounts for multiple businesses with a single owner.  Contact us for more information on that opportunity! Package 1 - $525 Package 1 offers all of the benefits of base membership, PLUS the following: Enhanced Profile Listing in Website Directory Listing Highlighted Products & Services Added 1 complimentary Broadcast Email 2 tickets to a Chamber luncheon Package 2 - $775 Package 2 offers all of the benefits of base membership and Package 1, PLUS the following: Listing Size Increased Logo Included in Listing An additional Broadcast Email (total 2) 2 additional tickets to a Chamber luncheon (total 4) Table at our annual Taste of Titusville 2 tickets to Taste of Titusville INVESTOR LEVEL BENEFITS We offer a special category of investment for those companies that seek to align themselves with an organization that is proven to deliver action and results.  These premium level memberships are for champions that support the work of the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce and want to help insure our continued capacity to deliver results. Trustee - $2500 In addition to all of the benefits listed in our enhanced packages, trustees are recognized as an integral partner in our programs.  As such, they receive the following additional benefits: Priority listing in online directory (rises to the top for applicable searches) Ability to add photos and videos to directory listing Pre-registration for one at every monthly Chamber luncheon Trustee recognition on website homepage and in weekly e-mail communications One complimentary luncheon sponsorship 4 tickets to our annual Board Installation event 2 players and a greenside banner at our annual Networking on the Green Golf Tournament 4 broadcast e-mails each year Inclusion in our Relocation Packages Our investors also receive Concierge Support to insure they are taking full advantage of their membership benefits.  Chamber staff will make personal check-ins at least quarterly to insure we are exceeding your expectations. Chairman's Circle - $5000 This is the premium partner position at the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce, and as such receives recognition and inclusion in all of our programs. In addition to the benefits listed in the enhancement packages, they receive the following: Priority placement (top of page) in online directory Ability to add photos and videos to directory listing Chairman Circle recognition on website homepage and in weekly e-mail communications Rotating banner ad on website homepage Pre-registration for two at every monthly Chamber luncheon One complimentary luncheon sponsorship 8 tickets to our annual Board Installation event Logo inclusion on all major events Corporate foursome and a greenside banner at our annual Networking on the Green Golf Tournament 8 broadcast e-mails each year Inclusion in our Relocation Packages Our investors also receive Concierge Support to insure they are taking full advantage of their membership benefits.  Chamber staff will make personal check-ins at least quarterly to insure we are exceeding your expectations. THE BOTTOM LINE You can’t afford to NOT be a member of the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce. As a member, you not only reap the tangible benefits of your investment, but you are also contributing to the economic success of your entire community. We enable our members to accomplish collectively what no one of us could do individually. JOIN BELOW. JOIN TODAY: Join as a Business... Please use this form to join the Titusville Area Chamber of Commerce as a business. This includes our base membership level, enhanced investment options, and investor level partnerships. This is an ideal option for political candidates, public figures, and anyone interested in supporting the Chamber that does not need to utilize the full business benefits and multiple listings in the directory. INDIVIDUAL JOIN FORM Join under an existing member...
